description.lang: Utilizes Z-Wave communication to control and monitor Z-Wave enabled products such as lights, door locks, shades, thermostats and more via a Pro Control system.Wireless control and monitoring of Z-Wave lighting devices via the Pro Control system.Compatible with a broad range of Z-Wave certified electronics including door locks, security devices, window shades, thermostats and more.Expandable and scalable system allows control of more than 200 devices.Programmed using Z-Wave Manager tool from within RTI proprietary programming software (Pro Control Studio) allowing easy integration into Pro Control systems.
